00001 #include "TDPGeneratorFactory.h"
00002 #include "MaxTimeDiffDPGenerator.h"
00003 #include <iostream>
00004 #include <vector>
00005 #include <cmath>
00006 #include "debug_tools.h"
00007 using std::cout;
00008 using std::endl;
00009 
00010 int MaxTimeDiffDPGenerator::ProcessPulses(const TSetupData* setup,const std::string& detector, 
00011         const AnalysedPulseList* fast_pulses, const AnalysedPulseList* slow_pulses,
00012         DetectorPulseList& output){
00013 
00014     if(!slow_pulses) return CopyAnalToDet(fast_pulses,detector,output);
00015 
00016     AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator fastPulseIter = fast_pulses->begin();
00017     AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator slowPulseIter = slow_pulses->begin();
00018     AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator finalFastPulseIter = fast_pulses->end();
00019     AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator finalSlowPulseIter = slow_pulses->end();
00020 
00021     std::vector< std::pair<
00022         AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator,
00023         AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator> > pulseIters;
00024     pulseIters.push_back(std::make_pair(fastPulseIter,finalFastPulseIter));
00025     pulseIters.push_back(std::make_pair(slowPulseIter,finalSlowPulseIter));
00026 
00027     // Loop through both TAnalysedPulse vectors until they are both finished
00028     // NB with this alogirthm this can be extended to more than 2
00029     double min_time = 999999; // something large
00030     double pulse_time;
00031     int count=0;
00032     while (pulseIters.size() > 0) {
00033       min_time = 999999e9;
00034       //DEBUG_VALUE(count++);
00035 
00036         // Find out which of the next fast or slow pulsees happened next
00037         for (unsigned int b = 0; b < pulseIters.size(); ++b) {
00038             pulse_time = (*pulseIters.at(b).first)->GetTime() * 1e-6; // convert to ms        
00039             min_time = std::min(min_time, pulse_time);
00040 
00041         }
00042 
00043         // Now go through and find all the pulses that are within a certain time of this
00044         double time_difference = 0.1; // 0.1 ms
00045         TAnalysedPulse* fast_pulse = NULL;
00046         TAnalysedPulse* slow_pulse = NULL;
00047         for (unsigned int b = 0; b < pulseIters.size(); ++b) {
00048 
00049             TAnalysedPulse* pulse = *(pulseIters[b].first);
00050             double pulse_time = pulse->GetTime() * 1e-6; // convert to ms
00051 
00052             if (std::fabs(pulse_time - min_time) < time_difference) {
00053                 if ( pulse->GetSource().isFast()) {
00054                     if(Debug()) cout<<"Fast? " << pulse->GetSource().str() << std::endl;
00055                     fast_pulse = pulse;
00056                 } else if ( pulse->GetSource().isSlow()) {
00057                     if(Debug()) cout<<"Slow? " << pulse->GetSource().str() << std::endl;
00058                     slow_pulse = pulse;
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 ++(pulseIters[b].first); // increment the iterator because we used the pulse
00062             }
00063         }
00064         TDetectorPulse* det_pulse = new TDetectorPulse(fast_pulse, slow_pulse, detector); // Create the TDetectorPulse
00065         output.push_back(det_pulse);
00066         if(Debug()){
00067             cout<<"Created a TDetectorPulse with:\n";
00068             cout<<"Fast Pulse: " << det_pulse->GetFastPulseTime() * 1e-6 << std::endl;
00069             cout<< "Slow Pulse: " << det_pulse->GetSlowPulseTime() * 1e-6 << std::endl;
00070             cout<< std::endl;
00071         }
00072 
00073         //Delete the iterators to finished banks. Go through in reverse to
00074         //avoid invalidation problems
00075         for (int b = pulseIters.size()-1; b >= 0; --b) {
00076           //DEBUG_VALUE((*pulseIters[b].first)->GetParentID());
00077             if (pulseIters[b].first == pulseIters[b].second){
00078                 pulseIters.erase(pulseIters.begin() + b);
00079             }  
00080         } // for (int b -reversed)            
00081     } // end for
00082     return 0;
00083 }
00084 
00085 int MaxTimeDiffDPGenerator::CopyAnalToDet(
00086         const AnalysedPulseList* fast_pulses, const std::string& detector,
00087         DetectorPulseList& output){
00088     if(!fast_pulses){
00089         cout<<"NULL TAP list passed to MaxTimeDiffDPGenerator for both fast and slow pulses"<<endl;
00090         return 1;
00091     }
00092     for(AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator i_pulse=fast_pulses->begin();
00093             i_pulse!=fast_pulses->end(); i_pulse++){
00094 
00095         TDetectorPulse* det_pulse = new TDetectorPulse(*i_pulse, NULL, detector); // Create the TDetectorPulse
00096         output.push_back(det_pulse);
00097     }
00098     return 0;
00099 }
